content: **crochet cardigan pattern for sizes xs-5x ** the bookworm cardigan is a comfy and relaxed-fit crochet cardigan with a tweedy old-fashioned texture that evokes the smell of leather-bound books and the sound of turning pages perfect for any self-professed bookworm this beginner-friendly cardigan is easy to wear for those long reading sessions on your couch at home or out and about running errands oversized pockets and a wide collar finish this long slouchy cardigan for a stylish addition to your garment favorites this easy crochet design works up fast with basic stitches simple construction and minimal seaming the main body of the cardigan is split for the armholes and seamed at the shoulders and sleeves are crocheted into the cardigan in turned decreasing rounds ribbed cuffs and a wide collar are also crocheted directly onto the design leaving the pockets to be made separately and seamed on at the end this pattern is written in standard us terms the featured cardigan is made with wecrochet **wool of the andes tweed** #4/worsted weight 80% peruvian highland wood 20% donegal tweed 110 yards/50 grams and uses us size i/9 5 50 mm and h/8 5 00 mm crochet hooks * colorway farmhouse heather - 15 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23 skeins approximately 1650 1760 1870 1980 2090 2200 2310 2420 2530 yards skill level - **advanced beginner** sizing/measurements - available in nine sizes fits chest xs 28-30 finished chest 34 s 32-34 finished chest 38 m 36-38 finished chest 42 l 40-42 finished chest 46 xl 44-46 finished chest 50 2x 48-50 finished chest 54 3x 52-54 finished chest 58 4x 56-58 finished chest 62 5x 60-62 finsihed chest 66 *fits chest refers to the measurement of the intended wearer finished chest refers to the measurements of the finished garment *this cardigan is intended to have a relaxed slouchy fit with 4-6 inches of positive ease in the main body of the cardigan *the model is wearing a size medium and is 5 4 with a 38 bust
